title: North American Sports Statistics
description1: This website shows statistics on a variety of North American sports!
description2: We offer statistics on NHL, MLS & NBA teams, as well as PGA Golf, showing their league stats in different ways.
description3: Scroll through the website to find out more!
nhl-description: We show NHL team statistics from the past 5 seasons in a horizontal bar chart.
mls-description: We show MLS team statistics from the past 8 seasons in a line chart.
nba-description: We show NBA team statistics from the past 5 seasons in a column chart.
pga-description: We show PGA statistics from the past 5 seasons in a list chart.
name: Name
copyrights: All copyrights belong to NHL, MLS, NBA and PGA
